patthana16.79:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.79:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
